benchmark_details.name: TutorQA
benchmark_details.overview: TutorQA is a new expert-verified NLP-focused benchmark for scientific graph reasoning and question-answering, consisting of five tasks with 500 QA pairs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess large language modelsâ€™ capabilities in educational scenarios, particularly in recovering concept graphs and answering questions effectively.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Constructing a concept graph from scratch can be challenging due to the exponential growth in pair combinations as the number of concepts increases.

data.source: Expert-verified question-answering reference pairs generated based on educational concepts and their prerequisites.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on correct predictions and semantic similarity.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in identifying concept relationships and answering questions.
methodology.baseline_results: Comparison with existing benchmarks like LectureBankCD, showing competitive performance.
methodology.validation: Performance validation against multiple models including LLaMa and GPT series.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: TutorQA has been expert-verified to ensure it contains no harmful or private information about individuals.
